articles.title: Wall St Week Ahead Tax-loss selling, 'Santa rally' could sway U.S. stocks after November melt-up - Reuters
articles.description: As U.S. stocks sit on hefty gains at the close of a rollercoaster year, investors are eyeing factors that could sway equities in the remaining weeks of 2023, including tax loss selling and the so-called Santa Claus rally.
articles.content: NEW YORK, Dec 1(Reuters) - As U.S. stocks sit on hefty gains at the close of a rollercoaster year, investors are eyeing factors that could sway equities in the remaining weeks of 2023, including tax … [+4051 chars]
